#summary A description of how the model data is stored in python data structures.
#labels Phase-Design

= Class Model =
Contains the following arrays:
   subModels[] - array of sub models stored in separate files (each of type Model).
   nodes[] - array of nodes
   links[] - array of links
   constants[] - array of constants
   vectors[] - array of one dimensional vector data
   2darrays[] - array of two dimensional look-up tables.
